devdoc.author: eludius18

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Lottery Smart Contract using block timestamp/difficulty as a source of randomness.

changeContractOwner(address).notice: Function to change the ownership of the Smart Contract

changeDefaultMiniumPayment(uint256).notice: Function OnlyOwner to change the minium investment defined in intilization

getBalance().notice: Get funtion which returns total balance in lottery Smart Contract

getMiniumPayment().notice: Get funtion which returns MiniumPayment Value

getPlayers().notice: Get funtion which returns an array of players in current lottery

getSelectWinnerOwner().notice: Get funtion which returns select Winner function Owner

selectWinner().notice: Select function OnlyOwner to select Winner using GetRandom and tranfer amounto to winner

userdoc.notice: This Smart Contract allow to enter ETH and takes prizes
